item.description:
This event posting is to get a good estimate of those going to the Night Out in West Hartford.

 

So basically, if you're  down to go out bar hopping and dancing in West Hartford after all the events before are finished (Wing Women Night Out. Wingmen Drinking Night), RSVP Yes. Even if you didn't go to none of these events but are up to go for the Night Out in West Hartford, RSVP. Location of where we will meetup is to be posted later. 

 

Also 11pm is just a more or less a guess of timing when all of us will be meeting up.

 

Christian

(860) 357-7264
item.how_to_find_us: You Can Call Me @ (860) 357-7264, I'll ask Sandra to give her contact Info
item.name: Night Out In West Hartford
